DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project test 12-month , culturally relevant , Smartphone-delivered PA program improve maintain high physical level reduce cardiometabolic disease risk among obese AA woman .
DOC.brief_title: Smart Walk : A Physical Activity Program African American Women
DOC.detailed_description: A three-phase study use refine implement establish theory-based culturally relevant physical activity promotion intervention obese African American woman . Phase 1 ( Aim 1a ) include formative research 25 African American woman provide feedback ( via 9 focus group ) refine physical activity intervention specify deep structure cultural relevance theoretical mediator self-regulation , self-efficacy , social support , behavioral capability , outcome expectations.5 Phase 2 focus technical development refine culturally tailor intervention 1-month demonstration trial Smartphone-delivered physical activity promotion program . Phase 3 ( Aims 1b 1c ) test intervention delivery strategy two-arm randomize trial 60 sedentary , obese African American woman receive either 6-month culturally relevant smartphone-delivered physical activity intervention 6-month wellness contact control condition
DOC.criteria: Selfreported African American Insufficiently Active ( < 60 min PA per wk measure Exercise Vital Sign Questionnaire ) BMI > 30 English speak read Own nonKindle Smartphone iOS 7 , Android 2.3 Concurrent participation another physical activity , nutrition , weight loss program Endorsement item Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) Pregnant plan become pregnant next 12 month Plans relocate Phoenix area next 12 month
